alert.note: Alert for Huerfano; Las Animas; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 17 at 1:50PM MDT until June 17 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Eastern Huerfano County in southeastern Colorado... Northwestern Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... Southeastern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 215 PM MDT. * At 150 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 19 miles east of Walsenburg, or 38 miles north of Trinidad, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Huerfano, northwestern Las Animas and southeastern Pueblo Counties. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
